entry.title: Dorios Excavate - Release
entry.summary: Dorios Excavate is now available ‚Äî a smarter, achievement-compatible way to mine, chop, and dig in Minecraft Bedrock. Automate your excavation and customize every detail to fit your playstyle.
entry.content:
Tired of chopping trees or mining ores one block at a time?
Dorios Excavate introduces a smarter, faster, and achievement-friendly way to dig through Minecraft Bedrock.

Smarter Mining‚Äã

This addon reimagines how players mine and gather resources.
Instead of breaking blocks one by one, Excavate lets you instantly mine entire veins, trees, or tunnels ‚Äî all while keeping lag to a minimum.

Each block is processed with a short delay to maintain smooth performance even during large excavations, making it ideal for both survival and multiplayer servers.

Full Control, Your Way‚Äã

Every player can fully customize their excavation experience:

  • Add or remove blocks from your whitelist
  • Toggle the excavate ability on or off
  • Change your Shape Mode (Line, Tunnel, Vein, etc.)
  • Adjust your Block Limit for performance and balance

Works With Achievements‚Äã

One of Dorios Excavate‚Äôs strongest features is its compatibility with achievements.
That means you can use it in your survival worlds without disabling Xbox Live achievements ‚Äî making it perfect for both casual and competitive players.

Performance-Focused‚Äã

Unlike traditional vein miners, Dorios Excavate was designed to be lag-friendly.
By spreading block-breaking operations over short intervals, it ensures stable tick performance even when excavating massive areas.

Available Commands‚Äã

excavateadd              ‚Äì Adds a block to your personal excavate whitelist.
excavateblacklistadd     ‚Äì Adds a block to the global blacklist. (Admin only)
excavateblacklistremove  ‚Äì Removes a block from the global blacklist. (Admin only)
excavatedefaultadd       ‚Äì Adds a block to the global default list. (Admin only)
excavatedefaultremove    ‚Äì Removes a block from the global default list. (Admin only)
excavatelimit            ‚Äì Sets your personal block limit for excavate.
excavateopenmenu         ‚Äì Opens your personal excavate configuration menu.
excavateremove           ‚Äì Removes a block from your personal excavate whitelist.
excavateshape            ‚Äì Changes your current excavate shape or pattern.
excavatetoggle           ‚Äì Toggles your excavate ability on or off.```

entry.title: Welcome

Here we‚Äôll be completing the full wiki for our addons, detailed guides, and everything you might need to solve your questions. This is just the start ‚Äî we hope you enjoy what‚Äôs coming and join us in this new stage for the Minecraft Bedrock community.
